abstract: A trio of writers groups have sent an open letter to members of the U.S. Congress who are also authors, objecting to the Google book settlement that seeks to create a vast digital library of mostly out-of-print books.
snippet: A trio of writers groups have sent an open letter to members of the U.S. Congress who are also authors, objecting to the Google book settlement that seeks to create a vast digital library of mostly out-of-print books.
lead_paragraph: A trio of writers groups has sent an open letter to members of Congress who are also authors, objecting to the Google book settlement that seeks to create a vast digital library of mostly out-of-print books.
